game.name: Train Simulator: Brockenbahn: Wernigerode - Brocken Route Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Journey to the highest peak of the Harz Mountains passing breathtaking scenery with the historic narrow-gauge Brockenbahn Railway from WaggonWerkstatt.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Journey to the highest peak of the Harz Mountains passing breathtaking scenery with the historic narrow-gauge Brockenbahn Railway from WaggonWerkstatt.
